roleset.name: to examine carefully, review, careful review, carefully examined
roleset.note: INSPECT-V NOTES: Member of Vncls investigate-35.4, sight-30.2. (from inspect.01-v)
INSPECTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on inspect-v.01. Corresponds to Vncls sight-30.2, investigate-35.4. (from inspection.01-n)
INSPECTED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT (from inspected.01-j)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Santa Fe stopped freight trains Tuesday night while its officials inspected track but resumed service at 10:45 p.m. when they found no damage [*T*-1] .

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: LSI LOGIC CORP. , Milpitas , maker of customized integrated circuits , annual sales of $ 550 million [*U*] , NYSE , has halted manufacturing at its three plants in the area while they-1 are inspected [*-1]for structural damage .

example.name: arg2
example.text: After the explosion , Kerr-McGee temporarily shut down itsfacility just south of Las Vegas for a safety inspection .

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: This test includes an inspection of the home for deteriorated paint,

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: their inspection of the premises furnished a more reliable basis for an estimate of damages
